ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="1 - NEW", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="4 – WAITING FOR CLIENT", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="5 - WAITING FOR 3RD PARTY", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="8 - RESOLVED", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="9 – APPROVED", BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c="REJECTED"), PRIORVALUE( BMCServiceDesk__Status_ID__c )="7 – ON HOLD" )
